title: Ronald Perelman Receives $750 Million Drexel Blind Pool for Corporate Acquisitions
summary: Michael Milken raised $750 million in a blind pool for Ronald Perelman, providing him with unprecedented acquisition firepower. This blind pool would prove instrumental in Perelman's biggest corporate targets and represented the scaling up of Drexel's raider financing model. The pool established Perelman as one of the most well-financed corporate raiders of the 1980s.
